sourcesContent:
import React,{useContext} from 'react' import BookContext from '../context/content/BookContext' import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" function Viewbook(props) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const context=useContext(BookContext); const {viewbooks}=context; const{image,title,author,price,description,tag,covertype,pages}=viewbooks; return (

Author: {author}

Title: {title}

Cover Type: {covertype}

Pages: {pages}

Description: {description}

Gener: {tag}

${price}
) } export default Viewbook
